verses.text: Assemble yourselves together, \w be|strong="H3808"\w* gathered together, O \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* worthy \w to|strong="H1471"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* loved:

\w Before|strong="H2962"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w decree|strong="H2706"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* dust \w passing|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H5674"\w*, \w before|strong="H2962"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w before|strong="H2962"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord’s|strong="H3068"\w* indignation \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* ye meek \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w wrought|strong="H6466"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w just|strong="H0834"\w*, \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* meek: \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* means \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord’s|strong="H3068"\w* indignation.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* destroyed, \w and|strong="H1961"\w* Ascalon shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* desert, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* shall cast \w out|strong="H1644"\w* Azotus \w at|strong="H1961"\w* noonday, \w and|strong="H1961"\w* Accaron shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* rooted \w up|strong="H1644"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w inhabit|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* coast, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* reprobates: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Chanaan, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* thee, \w so|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* coast shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* resting \w place|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H6629"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w folds|strong="H1448"\w* \w for|strong="H1448"\w* cattle:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* portion \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w remain|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Juda, \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w feed|strong="H7462"\w*: \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Ascalon \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w rest|strong="H7611"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* blasphemies \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* reproached \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1431"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* Gomorrha, \w the|strong="H5002"\w* dryness \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thorns, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* heaps \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w salt|strong="H4417"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* desert \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w spoil|strong="H0962"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* residue \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w possess|strong="H5157"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* befall \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w pride|strong="H1347"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* blasphemed, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* terrible \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* consume \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* adore \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w islands|strong="H0339"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w*, \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w shall|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \w with|strong="H1571"\w* \w my|strong="H1571"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* beautiful city \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w place|strong="H7760"\w* not passable, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w flocks|strong="H5739"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w lie|strong="H7257"\w* \w down|strong="H7257"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*: \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bittern \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* urchin \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* lodge \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* threshold thereof: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w singing|strong="H7891"\w* bird \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w window|strong="H2474"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* raven \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* upper post, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* consume \w her|strong="H3605"\w* strength.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* glorious \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w security|strong="H0983"\w*: \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*: \w how|strong="H0349"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* she \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* desert, \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w place|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w lie|strong="H1961"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w*? \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* passeth \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w hiss|strong="H8319"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w wag|strong="H5128"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.
